text: 2:20 1 Ning 16:31; 2 Ning 9:22,30Adubu eina nangonda yaningdaba leiba adu asini: Madudi masa mathantabu Tengban Mapugi wa phongdokpi koujabi nupi Jezebel-bu nangna yajei. Mahakki tambiba adugi mapanna mahakna eigi inaisingbu nupa nupi lannabagi thabakta amadi lai murtida katluraba pot chabagi thabakta lanna lamjing-i.
